mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.mobile, u.email, u.avatar, u.status, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name from base_user u left join base_user__role ur on ur.user_id = u.id left join base_role r on r.id = ur.role_id and r.deleted = 0 where u.deleted = 0

select u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.mobile, u.email, u.avatar, u.status, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name from base_user u left join base_user__role ur on ur.user_id = u.id left join base_role r on r.id = ur.role_id and r.deleted = 0 where u.creator = #{creator} and u.deleted = 0

select u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.mobile, u.email, u.avatar, u.status, u.created_at, r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name from base_user u left join base_user__role ur on ur.user_id = u.id left join base_role r on r.id = ur.role_id and r.deleted = 0 where u.id = #{id} and u.deleted = 0
